name: Princess jojo Make smoothies !
description:
Welcome to our smoothies empire, where you can make the best smoothies for jojo! Once your smoothies is done, use our decorating stuff that can turn smoothies into tasty and yummy desserts!

FEATURES
* Easy to use interface!
* It's so fun to make smoothies - do it step by step!
* Select ingredients: you're the one to choose what goes into your desserts!
* Make endless combinations: fruits and chocolate, veggies and nuts... Try out making different combinations of desserts!

Don't waste time thinking, just do it for your best siwa!
